Description.Text: This apartment complex lies on a site of some 140,740 m² and comprises 393 apartments spread over 120 2-storey chalets and 153 bungalows. The buildings cover a total surface area of some 20,000 m². 108 of the apartments have 1 bedroom, are about 40 m² in size and lie on the ground floor of the 2-storey chalets in the areas from 100 to 400, 68 apartments of 50 m² are to be found in the bungalow area in area 600, 150 2-bedroom apartments of 76 m², 42 of which are on just one floor, are to be found in the areas from 100 to 400, and 67 2 to 3-bedroom apartments of 86 m², 55 of which are on just one floor, are to be found in area 500. Facilities within the main building include an inviting foyer area with a reception desk, a currency exchange bureau and a safe in addition to a small supermarket, a variety of shops and a hairdresser's salon. It is possible to dine in the onsite à la carte restaurant and, on payment of an additional fee, a public Internet terminal. Fees also apply for use of the laundry service.
